title: Illegal Pete's
typeOfFood: Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Colorado-based casual Mexican restaurant chain; this one has a huge rooftop patio. Full bar and happy hour daily. Vegan suitable items include: cilantro lime rice, brown rice, black and pinto beans, fajita veggies, guacamole, salsas and chips, pesto (creaminess comes from nuts), and the veggie green chili is vegan but contains potatoes (same fryer used for non-veg). Could ask for gucamole as substitute for dairy in a burrito, bowl, tacos.
